title: Can't mak League of Legends client shortcut
body: I accidentally deleted my LoL client shortcut on my desktop but when I searched for it in my PC I  found lol.launcher which works when my PC files are open (like the library with desktop,documents,etc). However when I make it as a shortcut and close the files it says that some things like bugsplat failed to load

replies.body: How are you creating a shortcut for the patcher?  If you're dragging it out of the directory then it may not work.  Instead, try right clicking the lol.launcher, select Send To, click Desktop.  Let me know if that helps.
I was right clicking and selecting shortcut but your method works. Thanks so much
